程序包 jasima.core.simulation

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    SimComponent
    This interface provides basic functionality for simulation components.
    SimComponentContainer<SUB extends SimComponent>  
    SimComponentLifeCycleListener  
    Simulation.EventQueue
    Public interface of event queue implementations.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AllTests  
    EventHeap
    An implementation of Simulation.EventQueue using an array-based heap.
    SimComponent.ProduceResultsMessage
    Message send when a SimComponent is requested to produce results.
    SimComponent.SimComponentLifeCycleMessage
    Base class for messages send by a SimComponent to registered listeners.
    SimComponentBase
    Potential base class for simulation components implementing the interface SimComponent.
    SimComponentContainerBase<SUB extends SimComponent>  
    SimEvent
    Abstract base class for all simulation events.
    Simulation
    Base class for a discrete event simulation.
    Simulation.MethodCallEvent
    This class is used internally by Simulation.schedule(double,int,Runnable).
    Simulation.SimPrintMessage
    Simulation.SimPrintMessages are produced whenever print() or trace() is called during a simulation to produce status/debug messages.
    SimulationExperiment  
    TestSimulationBasics  
    TestSimulationPausing  
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    Simulation.SimExecState
